content.sql: SELECT aa.stockdate, --aa.prod_code, aa.dist_name, aa.prod, aa.C, aa.name, sum(aa.duenum1), sum(aa.dueprice1), sum(aa.duenum0), sum(aa.dueprice3), '' as expire_date, sum(aa.ordernum2), sum(aa.orderprice2), sum(aa.ordernum0), sum(aa.orderprice3), sum(aa.orderprice3)+sum(aa.dueprice3) FROM ( SELECT dbo.fn_getMarsWeekDay(convert(VARCHAR(20),dds.STOCK_DATE,120)) as stockdate, dds.prod_code, ddr.dist_name, dp.PROD_CODE AS prod, --dp.prod_category AS prodcategory, t1.item_name AS C, dp.PROD_NAME AS name, --正常品 sum(CASE WHEN dds.STOCK_TYPE not in ('DL','00002次仓库') THEN isnull(dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',dp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 end) AS duenum1, sum(CASE WHEN dds.STOCK_TYPE not in ('DL','00002次仓库') THEN isnull(ddp.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',dp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 end) AS dueprice1, (CASE WHEN dds.STOCK_TYPE not in ('DL','00002次仓库') THEN isnull(ddp.prod_price/dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',dp.PROD_CODE,1),0) ELSE 0 end) AS duenum0, sum(CASE WHEN dds.STOCK_TYPE not in ('DL','00002次仓库') THEN isnull(dp.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',dp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 end) AS dueprice3, --次品 sum(CASE WHEN dds.STOCK_TYPE in ('DL','00002次仓库') THEN isnull(dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',dp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 end) AS ordernum2, sum(CASE WHEN dds.STOCK_TYPE in ('DL','00002次仓库') THEN isnull(ddp.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',dp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 end) AS orderprice2, (CASE WHEN dds.STOCK_TYPE in ('DL','00002次仓库') THEN isnull(ddp.prod_price/dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',dp.PROD_CODE,1),0) ELSE 0 end) AS ordernum0, sum(CASE WHEN dds.STOCK_TYPE in ('DL','00002次仓库') THEN isnull(dp.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',dp.PROD_CODE,dds.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 end) AS orderprice3 FROM DMS_DATA_STOCK dds inner JOIN DMS_CLIENT dc ON dc.CLIENT_ID=dds.CLIENT_ID inner JOIN MDM_DISTRIBUTOR ddr ON ddr.DIST_ID=dc.DIST_ID inner JOIN DMS_PROD_MAPPING dpm ON dpm.DIST_PROD_CODE = dds.PROD_CODE AND dds.PROD_UNIT=dpm.DIST_PROD_UNIT and dds.CLIENT_ID=dpm.CLIENT_ID left join BASE_DICT_ITEM item1 on dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID = item1.DICT_ITEM_ID inner JOIN MDM_Product dp ON dp.PROD_CODE = dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE INNER JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM t1 ON dp.TYPE_ID=t1.DICT_ITEM_ID inner join base_org org on ddr.org_id=org.org_id inner join dms_data_product ddp on ddp.client_id = dc.client_id and ddp.prod_code = dds.prod_code WHERE dds.state='1' and dds.stock_date between (select cal_date from MDM_CALENDAR where cal_year='$year1$' and cal_month='$month1$' and cal_week='$week1$' and cal_day='1') and (select cal_date from MDM_CALENDAR where cal_year='$year1$' and cal_month='$month2$' and cal_week='$week2$' and cal_day='7') $orgSubCode$ $distId$ $distCode$ $prodCode$ $clientId$ GROUP BY dbo.fn_getMarsWeekDay(convert(VARCHAR(20),dds.STOCK_DATE,120)), dds.prod_code,ddr.dist_name,dp.PROD_CODE,t1.item_name ,dp.PROD_NAME, (CASE WHEN dds.STOCK_TYPE not in ('DL','00002次仓库') THEN isnull(ddp.prod_price/dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',dp.PROD_CODE,1),0) ELSE 0 end), (CASE WHEN dds.STOCK_TYPE in ('DL','00002次仓库') THEN isnull(ddp.prod_price/dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',dp.PROD_CODE,1),0) ELSE 0 end) )aa GROUP BY aa.stockdate, aa.dist_name,aa.prod,aa.C,aa.name,aa.prod_code
